name: It Just Werks! LLC
description:
You are the manager of a small business called It Just Werks LLC, where you're contracted to make various repairs. Make it through the week while keeping your company reviews up!

CLICK to navigate the menu

READ UP on your workers, incoming jobs, chat messages, and reviews

ASSIGN workers to jobs based on what clients are asking for

END THE DAY to execute the jobs and move on to the next day

Optimize your assigned teams and get better reviews! But be careful - if your employees can't get along, then your reviews will suffer!

Credits: 
Momin Khan - UI Programming
Pia Fermin - Art & Writing 
Haley Currence - Backend Programming

Made for Global Game Jam 2020  hosted by RVA Game Jams!
